snippet: Stocks were up 3 percent for the week, wiping out almost all of the losses after Britain voted to leave the European Union last week....
abstract: Stock indexes end week on upbeat note after fourth consecutive day of gains.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were up 3 percent for the week, wiping out almost all of the losses after Britain voted to leave the European Union last week.

headline.main: Wall St. Edges Up for 4th Day of Gains
headline.print_headline: Shares End Week on Upbeat Note
